item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:24, topic:332334”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=428771.msg3147703#msg3147703 date=1268250061]

Lmfao, I suggest you don’t go with the flow cause you might end up with a warning or even worse banned.

I suggest you use the search bar on the top right of the forum and type in “Grand Exchange”.
This is the only advice I’m giving you, and I doubt anyone has a working Grand Exchange.

Also, people who are flaming and are being angry at “xweetok599” don’t bother (EVERYONE MAKES MISTAKES).

REMINDER:

You don’t have no status of moderator or administrator privileges so let him be,
until a moderator or administrator views this topic.

If a person doesn’t follow basic rules what makes you think that they will follow bigger rules, don’t defend a person when you just joined forum it doesn’t make you look good or them good, also if you have been here as long as you said you have then why should we show you respect you should know the rules and respect the rules, don’t follow rule breakers it shows that you have no respect for the mods and admins and the rules. One last thing no requests, and don’t say that you know the rules because if you did you wouldn’t break them.
[/quote]

Who are you to be judging someone then?
Let him be and let a mod deal with it is what I clearly said, so learn to read between the lines.
I’m not defending no one, I’m just placing a statement.
I clearly told him, what you Quoted…

Lmfao, I suggest you don’t go with the flow cause you might end up with a warning or even worse banned.

What you didn’t see the first line?[/quote]

I guess you need to reread because the first line of my statement was to you, the rest was to him.

Read full topic
